paragraphs.title: Polyvalent Simplicity
paragraphs.desc: The new Camemberts hybrid range offers 12 Bases and 32 Holds, making it easy to easily switch grips, and add dimension and a twist to routes and problems.

paragraphs.title: Wide range of grips
paragraphs.desc: The camemberts Holds offer a varied range of grips, from pockets, to crimps and even pebble shaped sloeprs, ensuring re-usability and versitality with each combination.

paragraphs.name: name23
paragraphs.title: Sky-ball compatibles
paragraphs.desc: The camemberts bases are made to fit onto our existing Sky-ball range, further enhancing the range of possibilities, and making their usage hassle free.

paragraphs.title: Solidity in mind
paragraphs.desc: The bases of the Camemberts are made with our unique thermoplastic, tested strong and durable, ensuring a long life and reliable performance, withstanding the rigors of routesetting and long term use.

paragraphs.title: Design
paragraphs.desc: With the unique twist of styles combinations offered between the bases and holds, the new camemberts will fit seamlessly within setting color styles.
